name: World Travel & Cultural Exploration
description: Essential vocabulary for international travel, cultural experiences, and global communication.
context: international travel, cultural experiences, and tourism

words.meaning: a planned route or journey; detailed travel schedule
the place to which someone is going or being sent
lodging; a place where someone may live or stay
the action of booking something in advance
a style of cooking characteristic of a particular region
valued cultural traditions and historic buildings
a recognizable feature used for navigation or tourism
a journey undertaken for a specific purpose
a short journey or trip for pleasure
a memento of a visit to a place
traditional practices or the border control department
the official residence or office of an ambassador
the money used in a particular country
official permission to enter, leave, or stay in a country
